GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Dedup Addresses Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Delete unused duplicate addresses from constituent
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_GLOBALCHANGE_DEDUPADDRESSES ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
Begin
-- Table to hold selection ids DECLARE @CONSTITUENTSELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID)
--create temp tables DECLARE @CONT TABLE (PK int identity(1,1), ConstID uniqueidentifier, addr nvarchar(2000), city nvarchar(100), stateid uniqueidentifier) --DECLARE @ADDR_TO_DELETE TABLE (PK int identity(1,1), addrID uniqueidentifier PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @ADDR_TO_DELETE TABLE (PK int identity(1,1), addrID uniqueidentifier)
DECLARE @CONT2 TABLE (PK int identity(1,1), ConstID uniqueidentifier, addr nvarchar(2000), city nvarchar(100), stateid uniqueidentifier) --DECLARE @ADDR_TO_DELETE2 TABLE (PK int identity(1,1), addrID uniqueidentifier PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @ADDR_TO_DELETE2 TABLE (PK int identity(1,1), addrID uniqueidentifier)
--Populate temp table insert into @CONT select constituentid, replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt',''),',','') as bunched_addr, city, stateid --, count(*) as addr_count --, count(*)-1 as dup_addr_count from address inner join constituent c on c.id = address.constituentid inner join @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = c.id group by constituentid, replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt',''),',',''), city, stateid having count(*)>1
declare @I int = 1 declare @I_MAX integer declare @CID uniqueidentifier declare @bunched_addr nvarchar(2000) select @I_MAX = count(*) from @CONT while @I <= @I_MAX begin select --@dup_addr_id = addrID @CID = ConstID, @bunched_addr = addr from @CONT where PK = @I
begin try insert into @ADDR_TO_DELETE select id from address where constituentid=@CID and replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt','') = @bunched_addr and id not in ( select top 1 id from address where constituentid=@CID and replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt','') = @bunched_addr order by isprimary desc, postcode desc, addresstypecodeid desc )
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch set @I = @I + 1 end --end I loop
declare @J int = 1 declare @J_MAX integer declare @dup_addr_id uniqueidentifier select @J_MAX = count(*) from @ADDR_TO_DELETE while @J <= @J_MAX begin --begin J loop begin try delete from address where id in (select addrid from @ADDR_TO_DELETE where pk = @J) set @NUMBERDELETED = @NUMBERDELETED+@@ROWCOUNT; end try begin catch -- do nothing; likely fk constraint violation so we don't want to do anything at this time if that's the case. end catch set @J = @J + 1 end --end J loop end Begin try -- Let's cycle through dup addresses again to see if any remaining dups remain from selection. If there was a non-primary address -- set to keep earlier (top 1 based on previous order), this time through it will be set to delete while a different dup is set -- to keep based on new order by. The reason for this is in case it couldn't delete a dup earlier to to FK constraint. This will attempt -- to delete a different dup record. -- We must populate @CONT2 and @ADDR_TO_DELETE2 tables. Basically we're running twice, but with different order by to attempt to -- delete a different dup record. The primary will always be kept, but this is for non-primary sets of dups when a constituent -- has multiple sets of dups.
insert into @CONT2 select constituentid, replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt','') as bunched_addr, city, stateid --, count(*) as addr_count --, count(*)-1 as dup_addr_count from address inner join constituent c on c.id = address.constituentid inner join @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = c.id group by constituentid, replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt',''), city, stateid having count(*)>1
--begin K Loop declare @K int = 1 declare @K_MAX integer --declare @CID uniqueidentifier --declare @bunched_addr nvarchar(2000) select @K_MAX = count(*) from @CONT2 while @K <= @K_MAX begin select --@dup_addr_id = addrID @CID = ConstID, @bunched_addr = addr from @CONT2 where PK = @K
begin try insert into @ADDR_TO_DELETE2 select id from address where constituentid=@CID and replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt','') = @bunched_addr and id not in ( select top 1 id from address where constituentid=@CID and replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace (replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( replace(replace(replace(replace(addressblock,'.',''),'drive','dr'),'street','st'),'avenue','ave') ,'road','rd'),'lane','ln'),'apartment','apt'),'suite','ste'),'Boulevard','blvd') ,'number','no'),' ',''),'grove','grv'),'place','pl'),'terrace','ter'),'trail','tr') ,'highway','hwy'),'court','ct'),'#','no'),'square','sq'),'north','n'),'south','s'),'east','e') ,'west','w'),'county','cnty'),'first','1st'),'second','2nd'),'third','3rd'),'fourth','4th') ,'fifth','5th'),'sixth','6th'),'seventh','7th'),'eighth','8th') ,'ninth','9th'),'tenth','10th'),'eleventh','11th'),'twelfth','12th'),char(13),''),char(10),'') ,'dr',''),'st',''),'ave',''),'rd',''),'ln',''),'apt','') = @bunched_addr order by isprimary desc, postcode asc, addresstypecodeid asc )
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch set @K = @K + 1 end --end K loop
declare @L int = 1 declare @L_MAX integer --declare @dup_addr_id uniqueidentifier select @L_MAX = count(*) from @ADDR_TO_DELETE2 while @L <= @L_MAX begin --begin L loop begin try delete from address where id in (select addrid from @ADDR_TO_DELETE2 where pk = @L) set @NUMBERDELETED = @NUMBERDELETED+@@ROWCOUNT; end try begin catch -- do nothing; likely fk constraint violation so we don't want to do anything at this time if that's the case. end catch set @L = @L + 1 end --end L loop end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
